title: Çekiç ve Gül: Bir Behzat Ç. Hikayesi
overview: After graduating from the Police Academy in 1985, Behzat starts working in the Ankara Police Department Murder Bureau. He is fearless, intelligent, strong and charismatic. Behzat remains a detective, while all his colleagues move to higher positions. Although he always gets into trouble, he has his own methods of catching criminals. He is constantly referred to the disciplinary committee, but will never change. Behzat does not trust anyone, especially women.. Behzat does not follow the rules, he creates his own rules.
